name: Atlas Financial Corporation, Appellant, v. Investors Acceptance Corporation
name_abbreviation: Atlas Financial Corp. v. Investors Acceptance Corp.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
parties: Atlas Financial Corporation, Appellant, v. Investors Acceptance Corporation.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Decree vacated and case remanded for an adjudication in conformity with Pennsylvania Rules of Civil Procedure 1516-1519. See Thompson v. Thompson, 451 Pa. 546, 301 A. 2d 644 (1973), Stryjewski v. Local No. 830, 451 Pa. 550, 304 A. 2d 463 (1973), and Community Sports, Inc. v. Oakland Oaks, 429 Pa. 412, 240 A. 2d 491 (1968). Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert L. Frantz, with him Buchanan, Ingersoll, Rodewald, Kyle and Buerger, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Atlas Financial Corporation, Appellant, v. Investors Acceptance Corporation.
Argued September 28, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Robert L. Frantz, with him Buchanan, Ingersoll, Rodewald, Kyle and Buerger, for appellant.
Allen S. Gordon, for appellees.
November 26, 1978:
